content: I'm <color=#599d63>Kurt</color>, the station master of Huyou Valley Station. I'm delighted you chose Huyou Valley.
Once your information is registered and confirmed, there's no going back— oops, I mean, it can't be changed, so please fill it out carefully!
Feel free to come chat with me whenever you have time. I'll always be here.
Once your information is registered and confirmed, there's no going back— oops, I mean, it can't be changed! Please fill it out carefully!
Great! That's the spirit! Now, please fill in your information here.
Big Ears?! Ugh, I told Sani not to reveal my nickname. Let me introduce myself properly.

Nice to see you again! How's the journey been? You've come such a long way - I hope Sani's speed demon driving didn't make you queasy. My sister's usually quite gentle, but once she gets behind the wheel... things get pretty wild!
No, you don't want to leave! Come on, please fill in your information here.
Have you really decided to live in Huyou Valley?

Registration complete. So your name is <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>... it has a nice ring to it, just like mine. Unlike Huyou Lang, who insists he's called that because he's some "wandering soul from Huyou Valley"...
